testCases.label: Verify first truthy/falsy result (r1)
testCases.description: Checks that the element with id 'r1' in TruthyFalsy.html renders the text 'true', confirming the first JavaScript truthy/falsy evaluation.

testCases.description: Checks that the element with id 'r2' displays the text 'false', validating the second truthy/falsy expression result.
